      static void drawCircle(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      This method takes the mouse points and draws a circle on the canvas.

      This method takes the mouse points and grabs the content on the canvas that is selected.
      void drawCut(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      This method takes the mouse points and draws a white rectangle while grabbing the content on the canvas that is selected.

      This method takes the mouse points and draws an ellipse on the canvas.
      static void drawPolygon(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      This method takes the mouse points and the sides and draws a n-sided polygon on the canvas.

      This method takes the mouse points and draws a rectangle on the canvas.
      static void drawRoundRectangle(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      This method takes the mouse points and draws a round rectangle on the canvas.
      static void drawSelection(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      This method takes the mouse points and draws a dashed rectangle on the canvas to show what will be copied/cut.

      This method takes the mouse points and draws a square on the canvas.
